infoCards.heading: What do we do?
infoCards.intro: The Unique Application Models Laboratory (P.U.M.A.) operates at the interface of basic science, translational research and implementation innovation. We create and develop unique biological and bioengineering models to reliably reflect processes in living organisms and in clinical and industrial environments.

ai.description: We use AI algorithms to analyze the movement patterns of Galleria mellonella larvae as a response to toxic substances, including psychoactive substances, and to evaluate the efficacy of anti-infective drugs and drug safety in general

features.heading: Why P.U.M.A.?
features.subtitle: P.U.M.A. is a team of scientists who work efficiently, quickly and flexibly - like the catfish from which we took our name.
features.closing: If a science and technology problem arises in your clinic, company, start-up or during the implementation of a grant, you want to validate an idea, solve nagging questions or modernize an existing solution - we are here to do it.

tabs.description: We offer various forms of cooperation - from full-time positions, to internships, to PhDs. Choose the option you are interested in for details.

content.payroll: Do you want to work in a place where science meets technology and results really mean something? At P.U.M.A., there is no room for stagnation. We need people who think outside the box, act fast and are not afraid of responsibility. If research is your passion - we will find you a place on board.
content.internship: Have an idea that others would consider too difficult or too daring? You're welcome. At P.U.M.A., we don't run away from challenges - we turn them into projects, data, patents and publications that you can participate in. If you want to do more than just collect points for your resume, you'll find partners here who will not only listen to you and help get you moving, but also support you in both your day-to-day scientific inquiries and your struggles with bureaucracy.
content.phd: A PhD is more than a title - it's a chance to get off the beaten track and explore something that really fascinates you and the world doesn't yet know it needs. At P.U.M.A., we understand that every science project is a journey - sometimes you don't know where you'll leave, but that's why it's worth starting. We're here to help you turn your curiosity into PhD chapters, your results into publications, and your experiments into something you'll be proud to talk about later.

content.heading: Scientific and research cooperation
content.intro1: Our goal is to connect science with practice. We support both individual researchers and institutions that want to innovate in the fields of medicine, biotechnology and life sciences. If you have an idea for a research project or need support in implementing the experimental part - we invite you to contact us.
content.intro2: We work with universities, startups, research centers and companies in the pharmaceutical and biotechnology sectors. Regardless of the stage of your idea - from conception to analysis of results - we can help with its implementation and publication.
scopeItems: Implementation of the experimental part of the projects
